title: Question:
author: Chipstars
created_time: June 26, 2023, 05:52:22 PMLast edit: June 26, 2023, 06:34:06 PM by Chipstars
content: Elon Musk vs. Mark Zuckerberg: The Battle of the Tech Titans!Photo owned by DailyMailIn a surprising turn of events, two of the world's richest tech titans, Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg, have vowed to face off in a Vegas cage fight. The unexpected challenge, thrown on their respective social media platforms, has set the stage for a Silicon Valley showdown that's captured global attention.Musk, the towering Tesla and SpaceX chief, while Zuckerberg, the agile Meta CEO, with a keen passion for Brazilian jiu-jitsu, are set to duel. The question on everyone's mind now is: who will emerge victorious?As per a recent DailyMail.com report, Zuckerberg is the favored winner thanks to his jiu-jitsu skills and fitness level, despite Musk having the advantage of height, weight, and broader martial arts experience.We found an earlier post discussing this epic showdown, but we noticed there was no poll to go along with it. We want to hear what you, the tech-savvy community of Bitcointalk, think. So, we've created this poll. Who do you think will win the Musk vs. Zuckerberg cage fight?What are your reasons behind your choice? Is it Musk's sheer physical strength, or Zuckerberg's jiu-jitsu prowess? Maybe you believe in Musk's diversity of martial arts experience, or Zuckerberg's agile and fit body?Share your thoughts and let the speculation begin!Remember, this poll is just for fun. Always respect each other's opinions and keep the conversation civil and engaging.Can't wait to see your responses!Edit: Highlighted link to original topic inspiration. Here is also the direct link (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5457249.0)

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: There is no need for another thread about the fight between Elon Musk and Marck Zuckerberg, there is one already that we are discussing it. The fight between Mark Zuckerberg and Elon Musk. Who you betting on?To avoid spamming and double-posting, it is better you lock this thread.

comments.author: Chipstars
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on June 26, 2023, 06:08:18 PMThere is no need for another thread about the fight between Elon Musk and Marck Zuckerberg, there is one already that we are discussing it. The fight between Mark Zuckerberg and Elon Musk. Who you betting on?To avoid spamming and double-posting, it is better you lock this thread.Hey, I'm aware of the discussion. I'm linking to it in the post, but that discussion lacks a voting feature and I think it is different enough to not qualify as a double-post or spam. That's not the intention, but rather a more effective way to see how we all look at the situation.However, if others have the same opinion, I'm more than happy to lock it down.I'll edit so the link to the original thread is more visible.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: I think the first thread is still fresh and running with contributions already, although you have added the voting side to it but from the first thread we are already seeing that Mark Zuckerberg is topping the list of probable winner majorly because of his younger age and strength which is assumed to be an advantage. Also he is a white belt in jiu jitsu, so enough has been deliberated to the advantage of mark.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Chipstars on June 26, 2023, 06:17:10 PMHey, I'm aware of the discussion. I'm linking to it in the post, but that discussion lacks a voting feature and I think it is different enough to not qualify as a double-post or spam. That's not the intention, but rather a more effective way to see how we all look at the situation.The discussion lacks voting feature, but if you read people's discussions on the thread, you will noticed that they are picking who is going to likely win the match. With the odd for Mack Zuckerberg which is significantly low to Elon Musk, some people may prefer to go for Zuckerberg because of the person that is training him and his age. It is just a match that we would enjoy to watch and use just little amount to gamble if truly the match is going to occur.I see no reason of creating this thread, all that you need is to read what other people are posting on the other thread and see their opinion about the matter. As we are having a thread before that we are discussing it makes your thread not necessary.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: The fight is never going to happen, there is no need for this thread. It is unnecessary and should be locked.

comments.author: Chipstars
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on June 26, 2023, 06:30:03 PMQuote from: Chipstars on June 26, 2023, 06:17:10 PMHey, I'm aware of the discussion. I'm linking to it in the post, but that discussion lacks a voting feature and I think it is different enough to not qualify as a double-post or spam. With the odd for Mack Zuckerberg which is significantly low to Elon Musk, some people may prefer to go for Zuckerberg because of the person that is training him and his age. It is just a match that we would enjoy to watch and use just little amount to gamble if truly the match is going to occur.I see no reason of creating this thread, all that you need is to read what other people are posting on the other thread and see their opinion about the matter. As we are having a thread before that we are discussing it makes your thread not necessary.Yes, but does everyone that reads the thread comment? I think a lot of lurkers would vote, but not voice their opinions by posting. However, it doesn't matter, I will lock the thread due to popular demand.
